input_email_body:
Subject: Software Issues

Dear Customer Service, I am writing to report a problem with the Project Management features of our software. There has been a software failure, which may have been caused by recent updates or server overload You can reach me at sophia.rossi@service.it.. Services affected have been restarted and connection issues have been checked, but the problem persists and disrupts workflow My name is Elena Ivanova.. I would appreciate it if you could address this matter quickly and offer a solution or workaround. Please inform me if further information is needed. I look forward to your response. Thanks.
